info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 2:22AM CDT until August 01 at 2:45AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL ROCK ISLAND...NORTHEASTERN MERCER AND SOUTHWESTERN HENRY COUNTIES... At 222 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cable, or 13 miles northeast of Aledo, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Viola, Woodhull, Matherville, Alpha, Sherrard, Reynolds, Hamlet, Cable, Shale City, New Windsor, Taylor Ridge, Boden, Preemption, Ophiem, Wanlock, Swedona, Gingle Corners, Gilchrist, Old Gilchrist and Griffin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
